title: Alt★Hero: Q has the green light!
author: VD
content_html: On Day Three, the Alt★Hero: Q campaign has already hit $54,302 USD courtesy of the first 673 backers. The project is officially on, and the artists have been informed. Thanks to all the backers, particularly the QIA Agent with the impeccable timing who put the campaign over the top.
content_text:
On Day Three,
the Alt★Hero: Q campaign
has already hit $54,302 USD courtesy of the first 673 backers. The project is officially on, and the artists have been informed. Thanks to all the backers, particularly the QIA Agent with the impeccable timing who put the campaign over the top.
